grackle:BerserkerTotem.NAME: Bearserker Totem
grackle:BerserkerTotem.FLAVOR: If violence wasn't your last resort, you didn't resort to enough of it.
DESCRIPTIONS: All multi-hit attacks deal one extra hit.

grackle:FlammableFlask.NAME: Flammable Flask
grackle:FlammableFlask.FLAVOR: A magic flask containing chlorine trifluoride
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply grackle:Burning, apply an additional #b{} #yBurning.

grackle:PhoenixIdol.NAME: Phoenix Idol
grackle:PhoenixIdol.FLAVOR: A small carving of a phoenix, slightly charred.

grackle:LoftwingFeather.NAME: Loftwing Feather
grackle:LoftwingFeather.FLAVOR: The feather of a red Loftwing.
DESCRIPTIONS: Enter grackle:Aloft at the end of each turn.

grackle:OrangeGel.NAME: Orange Gel
grackle:OrangeGel.FLAVOR: Do you want a Companion Cube?
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 2 grackle:Speed at the start of each turn.

grackle:SimmeringHeat.NAME: Simmering Heat
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 energy, add a Burn with Exhaust to your discard pile at the start of each turn.

grackle:SlipstreamEngine.NAME: Slipstream Engine
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 grackle:Speed when you play a Skill.
